subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for less hostility
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I think groups pretty much useless. Everyone has a damn opinion that is
gospel truth. Then the freaking skeptics- that no one can question when they
say this all imagination, and when we question them we are attacking. Figure
that crap out! Arrogant idiots. I've reached my saturation point, y'all can
have this shit.

 Frank-S

> Those are not Frank's predictions, he is just posting the messages, and it

> The same thing will happen when you do it again....
> So what's the point in you being here.
>
>  ------------------------------
> *From:* EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] *On
> Behalf Of *rasterer
> *Sent:* Tuesday, August 24, 2010 10:08 AM
> *To:* EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> *Subject:* [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for less hostility
>
>
>
>
> I expect none of us like all the recent attacks, insults, accusations,
> threats, hurting of feelings, and attempts to piss people off.
>
> Can I suggest we stick to the purpose of the group: "the discussion,
> promotion, and developemnt of Electronic Voice Phenomenon, and Instrumental
> Transcommunication methods and technologies as used in the communication
> with spirit, and other entities."
>
> And that we go with Frank's philosophy "just take the approach, try
> different methods, see what works."
>
> No more threats. No name calling, insults, or accusations. Just try to keep
> a positive group attitude, be open that not everyone believes what everyone
> else does, and that's ok?
>
>
>   
>
